channel.title: Rum on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Rum on Strat

item.title: Azul Gigante
item.description: Refreshing big blue drink. Dangerously easy to drink.

item.title: Mojito
item.description: Light and refreshing. Feels great to sip outside on a hot summer day.

item.title: Dark and Stormy
item.description: Dark rum combined with stormy (?) ginger beer. A storm of flavors… In your mouth.

item.title: Sky Tai
item.description: A (slight) variation on the Mai Tai, a classic tropical cocktail that will make you feel like you’re a pensioner living in Florida.

item.title: Pina Colada
item.description: I didn’t use ripe pineapple and that messes up the cocktail. I’m going to have to try this one again…
